atd.pillage
Class PeriodicCollectionScheduler

java.lang.Object
  atd.pillage.PeriodicCollectionScheduler

public class PeriodicCollectionScheduler
extends java.lang.Object

This is a singleton that allows you to schedule collections for a StatsCollector. Under the hood it wraps a ScheduledExecutorService and runs a thread pool with a single daemon thread.

Nested Class Summary
static class PeriodicCollectionScheduler.StatsCollectorRunner
          Inner class that wraps a StatsCollector in runnable so the scheduler can call collect().
